en.today: You could feel slightly unrested and in need of physical pampering, dear Aries, as the Scorpio Moon aspects Venus and the sun this morning. Too much fun will likely have caught up with you, and it'll be essential to put your health first to reclaim your spark. Groundbreaking visions find you once Uranus and Neptune align this afternoon, elevating your ideas from decent to ingenious. Focus heavily on goals or projects you've been struggling to initiate, finding the boldness to move ahead. Even if you're not entirely sure of what the finished product will look like, brilliant results will come when you harness the electrifying momentum of this celestial exchange.

en.today: Don't bother trying to impress people who lack compassion or authenticity, dearest Leo. As the Scorpio Moon aspects Venus and the sun, you'll gain more fulfillment in being true to yourself and celebrating where you come from. Unexpected occurrences bring excitement to your afternoon while Neptune and Uranus align. Though some experiences may seem too good for words, trust that the universe is trying to elevate and spoil you. These vibes can also be harnessed to expand your influence, though it'll be essential to make the right connections. Set aside judgments around who or what will improve your situation, recognizing that sometimes you must take a chance to receive rewards.

en.today: The Scorpio Moon aspects Venus and the sun early this morning, dear Taurus, swelling emotions and egos. Try not to prioritize your feelings over those of those around you, and instead, do what you can to create an environment where everyone can be honest and receive the compassion they need. If you're unable to communicate calmly, pull back and take care of yourself to resolve issues later more effectively. Luckily, a sweet sextile between Neptune and Uranus grants full permission to lie low, nudging you to play in your reality. Your surroundings become an ethereal dreamscape under these cosmic conditions, helping you rediscover magic and beauty.

en.today: Your heart and mind may feel at odds this morning, darling Gemini, as the Scorpio Moon aspects Venus and the sun. Rather than racking your brain for specific answers, allow your intuition and emotions to guide you. More will be revealed as you tap into your feelings, in addition to the energy that surrounds you. A spark forms within while Neptune and Uranus align this afternoon, bringing popularity and influence your way. People will see you as an enigmatic force, especially when you prioritize your visions over what society expects as a whole. Embrace independence and authenticity, and your ambitions will fall into place.
